EmailTemplate.name: Event - Accelerate 2015 - Workshops.Email - Confirmation Workshop - Future Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmation: Workshop "Future Test Organization in Enterprises - Conceptual Discussion"
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Thank you for registering for our Accelerate 2015 workshop!
With this email we are confirming your seat in the Future Test Organization in Enterprises - Conceptual Discussion workshop, taking place at 11:30 am in the Salon Aichinger of the Novomatic Forum on October 22, 2015.
Please pick up your entry pass to the workshop at the Accelerate 2015 registration table.
We look forward to seeing you at Accelerate!
Best Regards,
Your Tricentis Events Team
